Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough supporting evidence to prove that the video represents the Pawna dam in Pune.
Exist alternative explanation: The video is actually of the Xiaolangdi Dam in China, as confirmed by multiple sources.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the video is not of the Pawna dam in Pune, but of the Xiaolangdi Dam in China.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by falsely attributing the video to the Pawna dam in Pune.
Understate: There is no evidence of understating in the claim.
Falters at times: The claim falters by misidentifying the location of the dam in the video.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the video represents the Pawna dam in Pune without sufficient evidence.
